meanings.sent1: The frog had a protuberant eye that made it easy to spot.
meanings.sent2: The balloon had a protuberant shape when inflated.
meanings.sent3: The protuberant nose of the clown made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The protuberant mountain peak stood tall against the sky.
meanings.sent5: The protuberant bump on the table caught my attention immediately.

meanings.sent1: The protuberant belly of the bear showed it had eaten well.
meanings.sent2: The protuberant veins on his arms were a result of hard work.
meanings.sent3: The protuberant cheeks of the chipmunk made it look adorable.
meanings.sent4: The protuberant clouds in the sky signaled an incoming storm.
meanings.sent5: The protuberant growth on the tree branch was a nest for birds.
